title: English Grammar and Tenses Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of English grammar and verb tenses with this quiz. Answer questions related to past tense, present tense, opposite words, and more to improve your understanding of the English language.

items.question: What is the past tense of 'eat'?
Which word means 'a large meal eaten in the evening'?
'She is reading a book.' is an example of what tense?
Which word means 'to make something smaller'?
'The cat sat on the mat.' is an example of what tense?
Which word means 'a sudden, violent storm with strong winds and rain'?
'Have you ever been to Paris?' is an example of what tense?
Which word means 'to make something dirty or untidy'?
'He will be working tomorrow.' is an example of what tense?
